text: midneun jadeul-iyeo! hananimgwa choehuui nal-eul midji anh-eumyeonseodo salamdeul-ege boyeojugi wihae jasin-ui jaesan-eul huisahan jacheoleom, eungeunhan jalang-ina haeleul kkichim-eulosseo geudaedeul-ui jaseon-eul heosdoen geos-eulo mandeulji malla. geuui yeneun beondeuleoun bawiwa gatnola : geu wieneun heulg-i iss-eo jangdaebiga geugeos-eul deopchini geugeos-eul heolbeos-eun chaelo namgyeonohdeola. geudeul-eun jasin-i eod-eun geos-e gwanhae geu mueosdo hal su eobsnola. hananimkkeseoneun bulsinhaneun mulileul indohaji anh-eusinola
